metadata.Name: FQuAD2.0
metadata.Description: FQuAD2.0 is a French Question Answering Dataset. It is based on French Wikipedia articles and contains over 100k question-answer pairs.
metadata.Paper Title: FQuAD2.0: French Question Answering and knowing that you know nothing
metadata.Venue Name: North American Chapter of the Association for Computational Linguistics
metadata.Abstract: We introduce FQuAD2.0, a new French Question Answering Dataset (FQuAD) with over 100k question-answer pairs. FQuAD2.0 is based on French Wikipedia articles and is designed to be challenging for existing QA models. We evaluate several state-of-the-art models on FQuAD2.0 and show that they still have significant room for improvement. We also analyze the characteristics of FQuAD2.0 and identify several factors that make it challenging for QA models.
